dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S1624 IS: Protecting Access To Care in Hawaii Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Schatz (for himself and Ms. Hirono) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to establish a floor on the work geographic index for physicians' services furnished in Hawaii.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Protecting Access To Care in Hawaii Act or the PATCH Act.

section.header: Floor on work geographic index for physicians' services furnished in Hawaii
section.text: Section 1848(e) of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1395w–4(e)) is amended—

paragraph.text: in paragraph (1)(A), in the matter preceding clause (i), by striking and (I) and inserting (I), and (J); and
by adding at the end the following new subparagraph:

subparagraph.header: Floor on work geographic index for services furnished in Hawaii
subparagraph.text: For purposes of payment for services furnished in Hawaii on or after January 1, 2026, after calculating the work geographic index in subparagraph (A)(iii), the Secretary shall increase the work geographic index to 1.5 if such index would otherwise be less than 1.5. The preceding sentence shall not be applied in a budget neutral manner.
